secaoInicial.descricao: Discover the exercises that give the most results, in a simple and organized way

home.titExercicios: Amazing exercises for you to train

vantagens.tit: The best place for you to get in shape
vantagens.descricao: Discover the most fun and practical way to achieve your fitness goals! Here you'll find a complete platform with detailed exercises.

items.texto: Find clear, step-by-step exercise descriptions for all levels. Whether you're a beginner or advanced, we have the perfect workout for you!
Follow YouTube tutorials created by professionals. Learn how to perform the movements safely and efficiently.
Filter exercises by categories, such as strength, cardio, or stretching. Save time and find exactly what you need!
Track your progress with ease! Log your workouts, view stats, and stay motivated as you reach your goals.

items.testemunho: I never imagined I could feel so confident training at home. The tutorials are amazing, and the filters help me find exactly what I need. I've already lost 5 kg and gained a lot more energy!
I used to be completely sedentary, but the site has made everything so simple and practical. I love following my progress with the training tracker. Today, my health is different!
The videos are super educational and motivating. I can exercise safely even without going to the gym. It's like having a personal trainer at home!
With my busy routine, I needed something quick and efficient. I found it all here! The exercises are easy to follow and the variety is impressive.
The ability to filter exercises by category was a game changer for me. Now I can alternate between strength training and stretching without wasting time!
The tips and trends keep me motivated. It's like having an up-to-date fitness guide always at hand. I've already recommended it to several friends!

privacy.subtit: Learn how we collect, use and protect your information.

dados.subtit: During the authentication process, we collect information such as name, e-mail address and profile picture. This data is a personalized experience within the application.

The information collected is used exclusively for the purposes of authentication and personalization of the user experience. We guarantee that the data will not be shared with third parties without the user's prior consent, except in cases required by law.

We have implemented security measures to protect user information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction. However, it is important to note that no system is completely secure, and we recommend that users also take precautions to protect their information.

By using this application, the user agrees to the collection and use of information as described in this privacy policy. If the user has any questions or concerns, they can contact us for clarification.

This application uses authentication services provided by Meta (Facebook) and Google. During the authentication process, information such as name, email address and profile picture may be collected in order to identify the user and provide a personalized experience.

We guarantee that this data will be used exclusively for authentication purposes and will not be shared with third parties without the user's consent, except when required by law.

dados.tit: How to request the deletion of the data from the linked social network themselves?
dados.subtit: To delete the data linked to your social media account (Facebook or Google), access the profile editing page within the application. There, you'll find the option to delete your account. Confirming the deletion will remove all stored personal data from the system. After deletion, the deleted information cannot be recovered.

terms.subtit: Please read our terms of service carefully to understand your responsibilities and rights when using our platform.

dados.subtit: By accessing and using our platform, you agree to all the terms and conditions set forth herein. If you do not agree with any of these terms, we recommend that you do not use our services.
The user agrees to use the platform responsibly, respecting applicable laws and the rights of third parties. Use for illegal purposes or purposes that may harm other users is prohibited.
To access certain features, you must register by providing true and up-to-date information. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their password and access data.
All content made available on the platform, including text, images, videos, and trademarks, is protected by copyright and may not be reproduced without prior authorization.
We reserve the right to change these terms and conditions at any time. Changes will be communicated on the platform, and continued use of the services implies acceptance of the new conditions.

leaderboard.descricao: Be consistent with training so you can reach the top
